>I dont think a tutorial would actually be that good IMO. Various styles of
>RPing is used in this RPG. Theres Chat ways of actions or using "::" before
>and after every action, theres the script like RPing, which I use as well 
>as
>some others, Theres also people who use story telling kind of RPing. If 
>there
>was just one way that everyone RPed it would be fine but everyone uses
>different kinds so it may confuse the person. Although teaching the basics 
>of
>RPing would be good but teaching them HOW to rp would be a bit rough. Heh
>everyone sooner or later learns on their own and they can adapt to styles
>they like.
